original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 328.00/10 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 328.00/10 to the US dollar on Friday, from 328.00/15 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.70/95 percent from 13.80/14.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.90/14.05 percent from 14.10/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.05/10 percent from 14.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.15/25 percent from 14.25/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/45 percent, from 14.30/55 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.00/45 percent, from 14.00/50 percent. (Colombo/Dec1/2023)
